name: openai-assistant-swarm-gui
description: Professional GUI for OpenAI Assistant Swarm Manager

scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/build frontend/node_modules node_modules

author: Mintplex Labs Inc
